title: United Kingdom Imports
description: Imports in the United Kingdom decreased to 72323 GBP Million in September from 75147 GBP Million in August of 2022. Imports in the United Kingdom averaged 28891.08 GBP Million from 1955 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 75147 GBP Million in August of 2022 and a record low of 1031 GBP Million in June of 1955. UK's trade is measured through both imports and exports of goods and services. In 2017, imports of goods accounted for 74 percent of total imports, mainly: electrical machinery (13 percent of total imports); mechanical machinery (10 percent); cars (7 percent); other miscellaneous manufactures (6 percent); medicinal and pharmaceutical products (6 percent); road vehicles other than cars (5 percent); clothing (4 percent); refined oil (4 percent); crude oil (3 percent); and scientific and photographic (3 percent). Main goods import partners were: Germany (15 percent of total imports); China and the Netherlands (9 percent each); the United States (8 percent); France (6 percent); Belgium & Luxembourg (5 percent); Norway and Italy (4 percent each); and Spain and Ireland (3 percent each). Services accounted for 26 percent of total imports. This page provides - United Kingdom Imports - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Office for National Statistics
